text: James D. Heiple (September 13, 1933 â€“ January 18, 2021) was an American lawyer and Republican politician. He was elected as a Justice of the Illinois Supreme Court in 1990. He was its chief justice from 1997 until his retirement 2000.James D. Heiple at Illinoiscourts.gov . Heiple was born in Peoria, Illinois. Heiple died on January 18, 2021 at a hospital in Peoria from a cerebral hemorrhage, aged 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Lawyers from Illinois Category:American judges Category:Politicians from Peoria, Illinois Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Deaths from cerebral hemorrhage
title: James D. Heiple
